comment.body:
I also set up a new public proxy.

https://proxy1.zeronet.functor.xyz:10443/

CloudVPS / Amsterdam / Netherlands / Europe. It should be accessible over IPv4 and IPv6.

It has Tor enabled, just because.

Unmodified zeronet.py. No logs or traffic sniffing. No debug logs. Running in docker container + nginx for reverse proxing and SSL.

HTTPS (HTTP on port 80 or 10080 will redirect properly) + strong ciphers + HSTS + secure cookies.

movax@zeroid.bit
